data.convo: Lisa , are there family rules in this house ? Well , I wouldn't call them rules , but there are some things that I expect my daughter to do . Like what ? Setting the table and doing the dishes . Is there anything else ? I also expect Cindy to tidy up her own room . Her room is very neat and clean . Yeah . She's a very responsible person . I will keep my room clean , too . That's a promise .
